channel.title: Why when i make a shop does it disonnect me
channel.description: I made a shop on my server and he appeared there and everything and when I compiled nothing was wrong. Then I go onto my server and I trade the npc and i get disconnected. Does anyone know why?

item.title: Why when i make a shop does it disonnect me
item.dc:creator: @candree candree
item.description:
@candree wrote:

i put where the tutorial said. It was in with all the other shops

item.title: Why when i make a shop does it disonnect me
item.dc:creator: @SivanScape SivanScape
item.description:
@SivanScape wrote:

Rofl you mean? the npc pulls out lobster? and starts fishing? or does he give u a lobster
and a lobster pot?

wait did u use it in this form?

[code=c][Add in shops.cfg]
30 pk_shop 1 1 4151 1000000

[Add in autospawn.cfg]
520 033432 3421 0 0 0 0 0 1 whip[/code]

o yeh wait where did u add it because u dont just add that.

Read full topic
